Package controller

Interface MainController

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    MainControllerImpl
    public interface MainController
    This interface contains various methods that are used in the main controller.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void getInitialController​(int option)
      It calls the related controller based on the choice from the main menu.
      ListOfStocksImpl preprocessStocksData()
      This method is used to process the stocks data file before using it.
      void programStartsHere()
      This method is used to display the main menu.

    • Method Detail

      • preprocessStocksData

        ListOfStocksImpl preprocessStocksData()
                               throws java.io.IOException
        This method is used to process the stocks data file before using it.
        Returns:
        It returns the ordered list of stocks from the pre-processed data.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - when there is an invalid input.

      • programStartsHere

        void programStartsHere()
                throws java.io.IOException
        This method is used to display the main menu.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - when the given input is not in the list.

      • getInitialController

        void getInitialController​(int option)
                   throws java.io.IOException
        It calls the related controller based on the choice from the main menu.
        Parameters:
        option - that is chosen by the user.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - when the user chooses an invalid or unlisted option.
